Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="ChangeBillingGroup"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Wcf"/> <Attribute Name="Procedure" Type="System.String" Value="AccountSync.ChangeBillingGroup"/> <Attribute Name="PersonalAccountNumber" Type="System.Int64" Value="{2}"/> <Attribute Name="NewBillingGroupId" Type="System.Int64" Value="{3}"/> <Attribute Name="RequestId" Type="System.String" Value="reversecut({0},4)-{4}"/> <Attribute Name="ClientId" Type="System.String" Value="SPA"/> </Attributes> </DataSet>
